ActLobbying Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Lobbyists Registration Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE LOBBYISTS REGISTRATION REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to improve the clarity and consistency of rules within the Regulations and to eliminate an inconsistency between the English and French versions of Section B.2 of form 2 in the schedule to the Regulations.
